verses.verse: וַיִּצָּעֵק֙ <S%H6817><s%> vai-yitz-tza-'Ek gathered themselves together אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish And the men אֶפְרַ֔יִם <S%H669><s%> 'ef-Ra-yim, of Ephraim וַֽיַּעֲבֹ֖ר <S%H5674><s%> vai-ya-'a-Vor and went צָפ֑וֹנָה <S%H6828><s%> tza-Fo-nah; northward וַיֹּאמְר֨וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru and said לְיִפְתָּ֜ח <S%H3316><s%> le-yif-Tach unto Jephthah מַדּ֣וּעַ׀ <S%H4069><s%> mad-Du-a' Why עָבַ֣רְתָּ׀ <S%H5674><s%> 'a-Var-ta Wherefore passedst thou over לְהִלָּחֵ֣ם <S%H3898><s%> le-hil-la-Chem to fight בִּבְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> biv-nei- against the children עַמּ֗וֹן <S%H5983><s%> am-Mon, of Ammon וְלָ֙נוּ֙ ve-La-nu לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> lo without קָרָ֙אתָ֙ <S%H7121><s%> ka-Ra-ta and didst not call לָלֶ֣כֶת <S%H1980><s%> la-Le-chet to go עִמָּ֔ךְ <S%H5973><s%> 'im-Mach, with בֵּיתְךָ֕ <S%H1004><s%> bei-te-Cha thine house נִשְׂרֹ֥ף <S%H8313><s%> nis-Rof with thee;we will burn עָלֶ֖יךָ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-cha upon בָּאֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H784><s%> ba-'Esh. upon thee with fire

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יִפְתָּח֙ <S%H3316><s%> yif-Tach And Jephthah אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Hem, about אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish he רִ֗יב <S%H7379><s%> Riv, strife הָיִ֛יתִי <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yi-ti were אֲנִ֛י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I וְעַמִּ֥י <S%H5971><s%> ve-'am-Mi unto them I and my people וּבְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-nei- with the children עַמּ֖וֹן <S%H5983><s%> am-Mon of Ammon מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od; at great וָאֶזְעַ֣ק <S%H2199><s%> va-'ez-'Ak and when I called אֶתְכֶ֔ם <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem, וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- did not הוֹשַׁעְתֶּ֥ם <S%H3467><s%> ho-sha'-Tem you ye delivered אוֹתִ֖י <S%H853><s%> o-Ti מִיָּדָֽם׃ <S%H3027><s%> mi-ya-Dam. me not out of their hands

וָֽאֶרְאֶ֞ה <S%H7200><s%> va-'er-'Eh And when I saw כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for אֵינְךָ֣ <S%H369><s%> 'ei-ne-Cha not מוֹשִׁ֗יעַ <S%H3467><s%> mo-Shi-a', that ye delivered וָאָשִׂ֨ימָה <S%H7760><s%> va-'a-Si-mah [me] not I put נַפְשִׁ֤י <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi my life בְכַפִּי֙ <S%H3709><s%> ve-chap-Pi in my hands וָֽאֶעְבְּרָה֙ <S%H5674><s%> va-'e'-be-Rah and passed over אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- against בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei against the children עַמּ֔וֹן <S%H5983><s%> am-Mon, of Ammon וַיִּתְּנֵ֥ם <S%H5414><s%> vai-yit-te-Nem delivered יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh and the LORD בְּיָדִ֑י <S%H3027><s%> be-ya-Di; them into my hand וְלָמָ֞ה <S%H4100><s%> ve-la-Mah Why עֲלִיתֶ֥ם <S%H5927><s%> 'a-li-Tem wherefore then are ye come up אֵלַ֛י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai against הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom unto me this day הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh this לְהִלָּ֥חֶם <S%H3898><s%> le-hil-La-chem to fight בִּֽי׃ Bi.

וַיִּקְבֹּ֤ץ <S%H6908><s%> vai-yik-Botz gathered together יִפְתָּח֙ <S%H3316><s%> yif-Tach Then Jephthah אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all אַנְשֵׁ֣י <S%H376><s%> 'an-Shei the men גִלְעָ֔ד <S%H1568><s%> gil-'Ad, of Gilead וַיִּלָּ֖חֶם <S%H3898><s%> vai-yil-La-chem and fought אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- for אֶפְרָ֑יִם <S%H669><s%> 'ef-Ra-yim; with Ephraim וַיַּכּוּ֩ <S%H5221><s%> vai-yak-Ku smote אַנְשֵׁ֨י <S%H376><s%> 'an-Shei and the men גִלְעָ֜ד <S%H1568><s%> gil-'Ad of Gilead אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֶפְרַ֗יִם <S%H669><s%> 'ef-Ra-yim, Ephraim כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki because אָמְרוּ֙ <S%H559><s%> 'a-me-Ru because they said פְּלִיטֵ֤י <S%H6412><s%> pe-li-Tei [are] fugitives אֶפְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H669><s%> 'ef-Ra-yim of Ephraim אַתֶּ֔ם <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem, O גִּלְעָ֕ד <S%H1568><s%> gil-'Ad Ye Gileadites בְּת֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> be-Toch among אֶפְרַ֖יִם <S%H669><s%> 'ef-Ra-yim the Ephraimites בְּת֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> be-Toch [and] among מְנַשֶּֽׁה׃ <S%H4519><s%> me-nash-Sheh. the Manassites

וַיִּלְכֹּ֥ד <S%H3920><s%> vai-yil-Kod took גִּלְעָ֛ד <S%H1568><s%> gil-'Ad And the Gileadites אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מַעְבְּר֥וֹת <S%H4569><s%> ma'-be-Rot the passages הַיַּרְדֵּ֖ן <S%H3383><s%> hai-yar-Den of Jordan לְאֶפְרָ֑יִם <S%H669><s%> le-'ef-Ra-yim; before the Ephraimites וְֽ֠הָיָה <S%H1961><s%> Ve-ha-yah happened כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki when יֹאמְר֞וּ <S%H559><s%> yo-me-Ru said פְּלִיטֵ֤י <S%H6412><s%> pe-li-Tei which were escaped אֶפְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H669><s%> 'ef-Ra-yim and it was [so] that when those Ephraimites אֶעֱבֹ֔רָה <S%H5674><s%> 'e-'e-Vo-rah, Let me go over וַיֹּ֨אמְרוּ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-me-ru said ל֧וֹ lo אַנְשֵֽׁי־ <S%H582><s%> 'an-shei- that the men גִלְעָ֛ד <S%H1568><s%> gil-'Ad of Gilead הַֽאֶפְרָתִ֥י <S%H673><s%> ha-'ef-ra-Ti Ephraimite אַ֖תָּה <S%H859><s%> 'At-tah you וַיֹּ֥אמֶֽר׀ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer say לֹֽא׃ <S%H3808><s%> Lo. No

וַיֹּ֣אמְרוּ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-me-ru Then said לוֹ֩ lo אֱמָר־ <S%H559><s%> 'e-mor- they unto him Say נָ֨א <S%H4994><s%> na I beseech thee שִׁבֹּ֜לֶת <S%H7641><s%> shib-Bo-let now Shibboleth וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and he said סִבֹּ֗לֶת <S%H5451><s%> sib-Bo-let, Sibboleth וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo not יָכִין֙ <S%H3559><s%> ya-Chin [it] right לְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> le-dab-Ber to pronounce כֵּ֔ן <S%H3651><s%> Ken, after that וַיֹּאחֲז֣וּ <S%H270><s%> vai-yo-cha-Zu Then they took אוֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To, וַיִּשְׁחָט֖וּהוּ <S%H7819><s%> vai-yish-cha-Tu-hu him and slew אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- at מַעְבְּר֣וֹת <S%H4569><s%> ma'-be-Rot him at the passages הַיַּרְדֵּ֑ן <S%H3383><s%> hai-yar-Den; of Jordan וַיִּפֹּ֞ל <S%H5307><s%> vai-yip-Pol and there fell בָּעֵ֤ת <S%H6256><s%> ba-'Et at that time הַהִיא֙ <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hi he מֵֽאֶפְרַ֔יִם <S%H669><s%> me-'ef-Ra-yim, of the Ephraimites אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <S%H705><s%> 'ar-ba-'Im forty וּשְׁנַ֖יִם <S%H8147><s%> u-she-Na-yim and two אָֽלֶף׃ <S%H505><s%> 'A-lef. thousand

וַיִּשְׁפֹּ֥ט <S%H8199><s%> vai-yish-Pot judged יִפְתָּ֛ח <S%H3316><s%> yif-Tach And Jephthah אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El Israel שֵׁ֣שׁ <S%H8337><s%> shesh six שָׁנִ֑ים <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nim; years וַיָּ֗מָת <S%H4191><s%> vai-Ya-mot, Then died יִפְתָּח֙ <S%H3316><s%> yif-Tach Jephthah הַגִּלְעָדִ֔י <S%H1569><s%> hag-gil-'a-Di, the Gileadite וַיִּקָּבֵ֖ר <S%H6912><s%> vai-yik-ka-Ver and was buried בְּעָרֵ֥י <S%H5892><s%> be-'a-Rei in [one of] the cities גִלְעָֽד׃ <S%H1568><s%> gil-'Ad. of Gilead פ Peh

וַיִּשְׁפֹּ֤ט <S%H8199><s%> vai-yish-Pot judged אַֽחֲרָיו֙ <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rav And after אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, Israel אִבְצָ֖ן <S%H78><s%> 'iv-Tzan him Ibzan מִבֵּ֥ית mib-Beit לָֽחֶם׃ <S%H1035><s%> La-chem. of Bethlehem

וַיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> vay-hi- had ל֞וֹ lo שְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <S%H7970><s%> she-lo-Shim And he had thirty בָּנִ֗ים <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nim, sons וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֤ים <S%H7970><s%> u-she-lo-Shim and thirty בָּנוֹת֙ <S%H1323><s%> ba-nOt daughters שִׁלַּ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> shil-Lach [whom] he sent הַח֔וּצָה <S%H2351><s%> ha-Chu-tzah, abroad וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <S%H7970><s%> u-she-lo-Shim in thirty בָּנ֔וֹת <S%H1323><s%> ba-Not, daughters הֵבִ֥יא <S%H935><s%> he-Vi and took לְבָנָ֖יו <S%H1121><s%> le-va-Nav for his sons מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הַח֑וּץ <S%H2351><s%> ha-Chutz; from abroad וַיִּשְׁפֹּ֥ט <S%H8199><s%> vai-yish-Pot And he judged אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El Israel שֶׁ֥בַע <S%H7651><s%> She-va' seven שָׁנִֽים׃ <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nim. years

וַיָּ֣מָת <S%H4191><s%> vai-Ya-mot Then died אִבְצָ֔ן <S%H78><s%> 'iv-Tzan, Ibzan וַיִּקָּבֵ֖ר <S%H6912><s%> vai-yik-ka-Ver and was buried בְּבֵ֥ית be-Veit לָֽחֶם׃ <S%H1035><s%> La-chem. at Bethlehem פ Peh

וַיִּשְׁפֹּ֤ט <S%H8199><s%> vai-yish-Pot judged אַֽחֲרָיו֙ <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rav And after אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, Israel אֵיל֖וֹן <S%H356><s%> ei-Lon him Elon הַזְּבֽוּלֹנִ֑י <S%H2075><s%> haz-ze-vu-lo-Ni; a Zebulonite וַיִּשְׁפֹּ֥ט <S%H8199><s%> vai-yish-Pot and he judged אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El Israel עֶ֥שֶׂר <S%H6235><s%> 'E-ser ten שָׁנִֽים׃ <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nim. years

וַיָּ֖מָת <S%H4191><s%> vai-Ya-mot died אֵל֣וֹן <S%H436><s%> e-Lon the oak הַזְּבֽוּלֹנִ֑י <S%H2075><s%> haz-ze-vu-lo-Ni; the Zebulonite וַיִּקָּבֵ֥ר <S%H6912><s%> vai-yik-ka-Ver and was buried בְּאַיָּל֖וֹן <S%H357><s%> be-'ai-ya-Lon in Aijalon בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> be-'E-retz in the country זְבוּלֻֽן׃ <S%H2074><s%> ze-vu-Lun. of Zebulun פ Peh

וַיִּשְׁפֹּ֥ט <S%H8199><s%> vai-yish-Pot judged אַחֲרָ֖יו <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rav And after אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; Israel עַבְדּ֥וֹן <S%H5658><s%> av-Don him Abdon בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son הִלֵּ֖ל <S%H1985><s%> hil-Lel of Hillel הַפִּרְעָתוֹנִֽי׃ <S%H6553><s%> hap-pir-'a-to-Ni. a Pirathonite

וַיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> vay-hi- had ל֞וֹ lo אַרְבָּעִ֣ים <S%H705><s%> 'ar-ba-'Im And he had forty בָּנִ֗ים <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nim, sons וּשְׁלֹשִׁים֙ <S%H7970><s%> u-she-lo-Shim and thirty בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei grandsons בָנִ֔ים <S%H1121><s%> va-Nim, sons רֹכְבִ֖ים <S%H7392><s%> ro-che-Vim that rode עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on שִׁבְעִ֣ים <S%H7657><s%> shiv-'Im on threescore and ten עֲיָרִ֑ם <S%H5895><s%> 'a-ya-Rim; ass colts וַיִּשְׁפֹּ֥ט <S%H8199><s%> vai-yish-Pot and he judged אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El Israel שְׁמֹנֶ֥ה <S%H8083><s%> she-mo-Neh eight שָׁנִֽים׃ <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nim. years

וַיָּ֛מָת <S%H4191><s%> vai-Ya-mot died עַבְדּ֥וֹן <S%H5658><s%> av-Don And Abdon בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son הִלֵּ֖ל <S%H1985><s%> hil-Lel of Hillel הַפִּרְעָתוֹנִ֑י <S%H6553><s%> hap-pir-'a-to-Ni; the Pirathonite וַיִּקָּבֵ֤ר <S%H6912><s%> vai-yik-ka-Ver and was buried בְּפִרְעָתוֹן֙ <S%H6552><s%> be-fir-'a-tOn in Pirathon בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> be-'E-retz in the land אֶפְרַ֔יִם <S%H669><s%> 'ef-Ra-yim, of Ephraim בְּהַ֖ר <S%H2022><s%> be-Har in the mount הָעֲמָלֵקִֽי׃ <S%H6003><s%> ha-'a-mal-Ki. of the Amalekites פ Peh
